message:
"I'm a Slave Stealer": How This NFL Coach Rallied His Team to Fight Child Sex Trafficking 
This field general has an off-field mission that recently stole his heart—helping to rescue children from enslavement.

data.description: "The problem's so large and so widespread. It's much bigger than we all would like to realize. The chief component has to be prayer." -Mike Tomlin
data.title: "I'm a Slave Stealer": How This NFL Coach Rallied His Team to Fight Child Sex Trafficking
